      • actualizeAncestorRemainingPlannedValues

        public static void actualizeAncestorRemainingPlannedValues(java.lang.Integer workItemID,
                                           java.lang.Integer parentID,
                                           java.lang.Double hoursPerWorkingDay)
        Once a planned value was changed on a leaf workItem or a new leaf workItem was created or copied or the parent was changed the ancestor planned values should be actualized
        Parameters:
        parentID -
        hoursPerWorkingDay -
        forceRecompute - cover the case then the remaining plan was set form a non null value to null (the ancestors contain the previous non-null values in their sum) FIXME it should be synchronized but performance is also important
